stand_out:
* Have the app display a loading indicator while the joke is being fetched from the server.
* Write a Gradle task that starts the GCE dev server, runs all the Android tests, and shuts down the dev server.

rubric_items.passed_description: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language
rubric_items.criteria: App is written solely in the Java Programming Language

rubric_items.passed_description: App utilizes stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio.
rubric_items.criteria: Submission must use stable release versions of all libraries, Gradle, and Android Studio. Debug/beta/canary versions are not acceptable.

rubric_items.passed_description: Project contains a Java library for supplying jokes.
rubric_items.criteria: Project contains a Java library for supplying jokes.

rubric_items.passed_description: Project contains an Android library with an activity that displays jokes passed to it as intent extras.
rubric_items.criteria: Project contains an Android library with an activity that displays jokes passed to it as intent extras.

rubric_items.passed_description: Project contains a Google Cloud Endpoints module that supplies jokes from the Java library. Project loads jokes from GCE module via an `AsyncTask`.
rubric_items.criteria: Project contains a Google Cloud Endpoints module that supplies jokes from the Java library. Project loads jokes from GCE module via an async task.

rubric_items.passed_description: Project contains connected tests to verify that the `AsyncTask` is indeed loading jokes.
rubric_items.criteria: Project contains connected tests to verify that the async task is indeed loading jokes.

rubric_items.passed_description:
Project contains paid/free flavors. The paid flavor has no ads and no unnecessary dependencies.

Ads are required in the free version.
rubric_items.criteria: Project contains paid/free flavors. The paid flavor has no ads, and no unnecessary dependencies.

rubric_items.passed_description: App retrieves jokes from Google Cloud Endpoints module and displays them via an Activity from the Android Library. Note that the GCE module need only be deployed locally.
rubric_items.criteria: App retrieves jokes from Google Cloud Endpoints module and displays them via an Activity from the Android Library. Note that the GCE module need only be deployed locally.

rubric_items.passed_description: App conforms to common standards found in the  [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).
rubric_items.criteria: App conforms to common standards found in the  [Android Nanodegree General Project Guidelines](http://udacity.github.io/android-nanodegree-guidelines/core.html).
